body.name: Lingito Travel Folding Toothbrush, Camping Toothbrush Bulk, Medium Bristle (6 Pack Medium-Multicolor)

Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 3 hrs 59 mins
features: ✅BRIGHTEN UP YOUR SMILE: Each toothbrush is made with medium bristles that are safe for adults and children. Prevent cavities, strengthen your gums and promote a healthy brushing routine for your kids.

✅NO MORE DAMAGE TO GUMS: Our bristles are made soft to the touch to prevent any damage from being done to the enamel of your teeth when removing plaque. Brush away & feel the difference with our medium strength bristles.
✅ERGONOMIC DESIGN: We've made these toothbrushes with you in mind - The ergonomic shape and soft handle will make brushing enjoyable for you again!
✅PORTABLE & FOLDABLE: Prevent your toothbrush from exposure to all sorts of bacteria, our foldable handles keep your charcoal toothbrush clean, and far away from germs!

✅6 PACK BULK FAMILY PACK: No need to look any further, with our travel toothbrushes you can ensure that everyone in the family has a toothbrush with a unique color. That means no more confusion, and best of all everyone’s toothbrush is 100% safe from bacteria!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What's Included? Travel Toothbrush (6 Pack) made with an on the go folding feature & medium bristles. Features: Take your toothbrush with you on the go with our convenient folding feature to keep your toothbrush clean and away from bacteria!Medium bristles with an ergonomic handle make it enjoyable to brush your teeth and it helps prevent any damage being done to your enamel or gums.6 Pack of Toothbrushes so everyone in the family has one to use for traveling or whenever out and about.

TRAVEL DESIGN You will receive 6 firm toothbrushes easily fits your pocket, purse, office desk drawer, travel toothbrush kit, and toiletries bag. Our medium bristle toothbrush has a slender design that is supple, which can pierce the deepest part of your teeth fight tartar, plaque and other particles. These manual toothbrushes can clean your teeth deeply without damaging or hurting your sensitive gums. DENTIST RECOMMENDED This foldable toothbrush has been clinically recommended for its effective cleaning, plaque removal, and gentle gum protection Prevent cavities, strengthen your gums and promote a healthy brushing routine for your everyone in the family. These toothbrushes medium bristles are also packed that can be easily brought as a travel toothbrush or camping toothbrush. EASILY FOLDABLE Regular-sized brush that instantly folds into travel-size toothbrush in one-flip action. Must-have in your travel toothbrush case. Our manual toothbrushes are designed to be used multiple times, even up to months! Medium bristles are flexible enough to fight and reach particles and other substances in your teeth.

Manual Toothbrush Healthy Benefits: • Using a medium bristled toothbrush will fight plaques and harmful particles from your mouth which makes it healthy. A clean and healthy mouth will prevent the germsfrom entering your lungs, hence, protecting you from getting different respiratory illness as well. • Medium bristle toothbrushes are recommended by dentists because they are gentle on teeth and gums while effectively fighting particles and plaque. This is a toothbrush soft bristle that is useful for both your kids and you adults and is able to brush your teeth and gums without irritation. Hard bristle toothbrushes can irritate gums and cause bleeding. • Medium bristled toothbrushes will not be too hard on your teeth's enamels. Hard bristled toothbrushes will wear away your enamels which will make it weaker and eventually cause you a great amount of pain. Harder bristles will also put an additional force on your teeth, nicking away at the integrity. Toothpaste already contains chemicals that is rough on the teeth, so don’t make it worse by using a hard bristled toothbrush into the mix.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy for travel use and can be stored in all bags since it folds small. It helps to cover the brush and keep it clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for travel
reviews.reviewText: Love these toothbrushes! They pack up small and the handle isn’t flimsy! Love them for the price, will definitely continue to buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent, could be better
reviews.reviewText: Not bad. Bristles could be more sturdy but it was super convenient when traveling no worrying about where to put your wet tooth brush to dry or carrying around an extra case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Buy in bulk for travelGood quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed
reviews.reviewText: I brush my teeth after meals. When I’m not home these are prefect to use and fit nicely in my purse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Ok for one time travel. These are of lower quality and the bristles are very soft. Not sure if the will be used for our next vacation. They were cheap so not much loss.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact, Sanitary, Colorful
reviews.reviewText: No more separate container to keep the bristles sanitized. Simply fold and pack, saving time and space. Works like any other tooth brush for short trips. Plus the vibrant colors make it stand out, so you never leave it behind. I would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for in the go

reviews.reviewText: très pratique dans le sac a main ou en voyage, très doux pour les gencives, je recommande

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 9, 2021
reviews.reviewText: The folding mechanism is just annoying. Sometimes it gets stuck. The brush itself is too soft and when it loses its shape, which will happen quickly, it's impossible to fold it correctly again. Wouldn't recommend.
